events.title: Mud Funk - DANCE
events.description: Tickets $20 in stores from Cranky Dog in Parksville, Heaven on Earth in Qualicum Beach or at the Errington General Store and $22.50 online at https://ErringtonHall.Tickit.ca. Coffee and great treats available from the kitchen

events.title: COFFEE HOUSE - OPEN-MIC
events.description:
Admission $5 at the door. Musicians and entertainers free.
Coffee and treats available from the kitchen. Coffee courtesy of Creekmore Coffee

events.title: KIDS / YOUTH JUICE HOUSE
events.description:
The Juice House is an open-mic night for kids, held in a coffee house style. Kids, ages 5 – 15, of all levels and abilities are welcome to come and perform.
Admission Adults $5; Kids 12 & under $2; under 2 are free.
Juice, Tea, Coffee, Tea and treats available from the kitchen by donation.
